title: The Ultimate Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['125g crispy rice cereal, such as Rice Krispies', '225g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '225g butter, softened', '150g caster sugar', '110g light brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '340g plain chocolate chips']
